short_term_memory.content: Pranav came to me with unsettling talk of the towntry" or pick a side without knowing the whole truth.

Someone approached me with unsettling words, claiming this was which I found quite odd and confusing. Their strange repetition offered no clear purpose or actions to understand their intent, leaving me cautious about what they might mean.

I was quite put off when someone repeatedly called me a name that wasn't mine, showing a clear lack of respect despite my corrections. Then they just said a strange word, leaving me confused and wondering how any honest interaction could begin this way.

Someone just came up to me, calling me and claiming wet know them and that's certainly not my name. Their words felt dishonest, and my gut told me to be wary of someone who misidentifies me and claims false familiarity. I just wanted to know their true purpose.
